Package com.xhive.core.interfaces

This package contains the X-Hive core interfaces, that give access to database (meta-)information, database users and authorities, and control the connection to the database (including transaction control).

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
XhiveAuthorityIf Controls permissions on user objects.
XhiveDatabaseIf Represents an X-Hive/DB database.
XhiveDriverIf The X-Hive/DB driver provides factory methods for different functionalities of X-Hive/DB.
XhiveDriverIf.XhiveDriverObserverIf An interface that can be implemented by application code to be notified of events in the X-Hive/DB subsystem.
XhiveFederationFactoryIf Contains methods to create and restore federations.
XhiveFederationFactoryIf.PathMapper An interface that can be implemented to restore federations to directories different from the original location.
XhiveFederationIf The federation object manages the collection of X-Hive/DB databases, and is only accessible by the super user.
XhiveFileIf Represents a physical storage location used by the database.
XhiveGrammarPoolIf X-Hive/DB uses Xerces Java 2 to parse and validate documents with XML Schema.
XhiveGroupIf A XhiveGroupIf represents a collection of XhiveUserIf objects.
XhiveGroupListIf Collects XhiveGroupIf objects in a list.
XhiveLocationIteratorIf Iterator for a list of XhiveLocationIf objects.
XhiveLockingContextIf This interface is implemented by objects that represent a locking context, and enables users to lock such an object explicitly.
XhiveNamedItemIf An XhiveNamedItem is an object that has the following properties: Name Description Creation date Modification date Named items are owned by a user.
XhiveNodeIteratorIf Iterator for a list of XhiveNodeIf objects.
XhivePageCacheIf This interface represents a cache of pages that can be used by federations.
XhiveSegmentIf A segment is a logical storage location in an X-Hive database.
XhiveSessionIf Represents an extended interaction between an application and the connected database.
XhiveSessionIf.TimeStamp An interface to be used with XhiveSessionIf.getUpdateTimeStamp() and XhiveSessionIf.waitForTimeStamp(com.xhive.core.interfaces.XhiveSessionIf.TimeStamp).
XhiveUserIf Represents an X-Hive/DB User.
XhiveUserListIf Collects XhiveUserIf objects in a list.
 

Package com.xhive.core.interfaces Description

This package contains the X-Hive core interfaces, that give access to database (meta-)information, database users and authorities, and control the connection to the database (including transaction control).

All database-related actions within X-Hive/DB must take place within a session. To be able to use a session you must create one using a driver retrieved from a factory. Here are the related classes that together allow database access: 

com.xhive.XhiveDriverFactory.getDriver()
    XhiveDriverIf.createSession()
        XhiveSessionIf.connect(userName, userPassword, databaseName)
            XhiveSessionIf.begin/commit/rollback()

XhiveNamedItemIf and XhiveAuthorityIf control access to meta-information as well as access control of most X-Hive/DB related stored objects. Access can be granted to users and groups that are maintained on each database (XhiveDatabaseIf).

XhiveFederationIf allows databases to be added or removed.
